name: Elf
description: Long-lived and graceful, elves embody memory, artistry, and quiet intensity. Their cultures vary wildly depending on their homeland â€” some dwell among ancient forests, others in high starlit spires, and still others in shadow-haunted ruins.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.
